text:
Hi we would like to migrate our website from wordpress to HubSpot CMS and I came across this service of HubSpot. 
<https://www.HubSpot.com/services/professional/migrations/website-migration|https://www.HubSpot.com/services/professional/migrations/website-migration>

Before contacting HubSpot I just wanted to make sure if Huspot offers this service. Basically the first 18 pages would be free?

Yes we offer this service. As for how many pages, the website says first 20.

The migration service effectively recreates your existing website’s front-end in HubSpot.

If you’re looking for a brand new web design and a custom feeling website implementation. We have a lot of solutions partners that would be happy to help <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/website-development>
Great! Thanks for your quick response Jon :)
